node.label: Organized by the project
node.hasNote: The thematic and organisational conception of the event is carried out by the project (if necessary with other partners).

node.label: Contribution from the project
node.hasNote: Contribution from the project to an event organised by a third party.

node.label: Participation
node.hasNote: Participation in a third-party event without an explicit contribution from the project (i.e. no presentation of results)
